languages.text: "Восстала из пепла, коим стало мое прошлое, шерин. Я много думала о том, кем была и кем стала, и поняла, что Джай Хейдари — это больше, чем имя. Это та жизнь, о которой я мечтала с младых когтей и которую смогла выцарапать у мироздания. Когда-то это было маской, но теперь... Это просто я. И мне нечего стесняться".

"I have risen from the ashes of my past, shereen. I thought a lot about who I used to be and who I've become, and I realised that Jae Heydari is more than just a name. It is the life I've dreamt of since I was a child, the life I've managed to carve out of the cosmos for myself. It used to be a mask, but now... it is simply me. And I have nothing to be ashamed of."
languages.original_text: "Восстала из пепла, коим стало мое прошлое, шерин. Я много думала о том, кем была и кем стала, и поняла, что Джай Хейдари — это больше, чем имя. Это та жизнь, о которой я мечтала с младых когтей и которую смогла выцарапать у мироздания. Когда-то это было маской, но теперь... Это просто я. И мне нечего стесняться".

It is the life I've dreamt of since I was a child, the life I've managed to carve out of the cosmos for myself. It used to be a mask, but now... it is simply me. And I have nothing to be ashamed of."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我已经从过去的灰烬中重生了，亲爱的。关于我的过去与现在，我想了很多很多。我意识到，婕伊·海达利不仅仅只是我的名字，它是我从小就梦想的生活，是我在这个宇宙中亲手为自己创造的生活。它曾经是我的面具，可现在……它就是我，我没有什么值得羞愧的事情。”
languages.original_text: "I have risen from the ashes of my past, shereen. I thought a lot about who I used to be and who I've become, and I realised that Jae Heydari is more than just a name. It is the life I've dreamt of since I was a child, the life I've managed to carve out of the cosmos for myself. It used to be a mask, but now... it is simply me. And I have nothing to be ashamed of."

traits.locale_text: “我已经从过去的灰烬中重生了，亲爱的。关于我的过去与现在，我想了很多很多。我意识到，婕伊·海达利不仅仅只是我的名字，它是我从小就梦想的生活，是我在这个宇宙中亲手为自己创造的生活。它曾经是我的面具，可现在……它就是我，我没有什么值得羞愧的事情。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「アタシは過去の灰の中から立ち上がったんだ、シェリーン。そして、ジェイ・ヘイダリは単なる名前ではないことに気づいたんだよ。子供の頃から夢見てきた人生であり、宇宙から切り開いてきた自分の人生なんだってことに。かつては仮面だったが、今は…アタシそのものなんだ。何も恥じることなんてない」
languages.original_text: "I have risen from the ashes of my past, shereen. I thought a lot about who I used to be and who I've become, and I realised that Jae Heydari is more than just a name. It is the life I've dreamt of since I was a child, the life I've managed to carve out of the cosmos for myself. It used to be a mask, but now... it is simply me. And I have nothing to be ashamed of."

traits.locale_text: 「アタシは過去の灰の中から立ち上がったんだ、シェリーン。そして、ジェイ・ヘイダリは単なる名前ではないことに気づいたんだよ。子供の頃から夢見てきた人生であり、宇宙から切り開いてきた自分の人生なんだってことに。かつては仮面だったが、今は…アタシそのものなんだ。何も恥じることなんてない」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «He renacido de las cenizas de mi pasado, shereen. He pensado mucho en lo que era y lo que soy y me he dado cuenta de que Jae Heydari es mucho más que un nombre. Es la vida con la que he soñado desde que era niña, la vida que he logrado labrarme en el cosmos. Antes era una máscara, ¿sabe? Pero ahora... soy yo. Y no tengo nada de qué avergonzarme».
languages.original_text: "I have risen from the ashes of my past, shereen. I thought a lot about who I used to be and who I've become, and I realised that Jae Heydari is more than just a name. It is the life I've dreamt of since I was a child, the life I've managed to carve out of the cosmos for myself. It used to be a mask, but now... it is simply me. And I have nothing to be ashamed of."

traits.locale_text: «He renacido de las cenizas de mi pasado, shereen. He pensado mucho en lo que era y lo que soy y me he dado cuenta de que Jae Heydari es mucho más que un nombre. Es la vida con la que he soñado desde que era niña, la vida que he logrado labrarme en el cosmos. Antes era una máscara, ¿sabe? Pero ahora... soy yo. Y no tengo nada de qué avergonzarme».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai réussi à renaître des cendres de mon passé, shereen. J'ai beaucoup réfléchi à la personne que j'étais et à celle que je suis devenue, ce qui m'a fait comprendre que Jae Heydari est plus qu'un nom ; c'est la vie dont je rêvais déjà étant enfant, la vie que je suis parvenue à bâtir au beau milieu du cosmos. Longtemps, ce nom aura été un masque, mais aujourd'hui... Jae, c'est moi, tout simplement. Et je n'ai pas à en avoir honte. »
languages.original_text: "I have risen from the ashes of my past, shereen. I thought a lot about who I used to be and who I've become, and I realised that Jae Heydari is more than just a name. It is the life I've dreamt of since I was a child, the life I've managed to carve out of the cosmos for myself. It used to be a mask, but now... it is simply me. And I have nothing to be ashamed of."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai réussi à renaître des cendres de mon passé, shereen. J'ai beaucoup réfléchi à la personne que j'étais et à celle que je suis devenue, ce qui m'a fait comprendre que Jae Heydari est plus qu'un nom ; c'est la vie dont je rêvais déjà étant enfant, la vie que je suis parvenue à bâtir au beau milieu du cosmos. Longtemps, ce nom aura été un masque, mais aujourd'hui... Jae, c'est moi, tout simplement. Et je n'ai pas à en avoir honte. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin aus der Asche meiner Vergangenheit auferstanden, Shereen. Ich habe viel darüber nachgedacht, wer ich früher war und zu wem ich geworden bin, und dabei wurde mir klar, dass Jae Heydari mehr ist als nur ein Name. Jae Heydari steht für das Leben, von dem ich seit meiner Kindheit geträumt habe, das Leben, was ich mir erarbeitet habe. Früher war mein Leben eine Maske, aber mittlerweile ... habe ich zu mir selbst gefunden. Und es gibt nichts, für das ich mich schämen müsste."
languages.original_text: "I have risen from the ashes of my past, shereen. I thought a lot about who I used to be and who I've become, and I realised that Jae Heydari is more than just a name. It is the life I've dreamt of since I was a child, the life I've managed to carve out of the cosmos for myself. It used to be a mask, but now... it is simply me. And I have nothing to be ashamed of."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin aus der Asche meiner Vergangenheit auferstanden, Shereen. Ich habe viel darüber nachgedacht, wer ich früher war und zu wem ich geworden bin, und dabei wurde mir klar, dass Jae Heydari mehr ist als nur ein Name. Jae Heydari steht für das Leben, von dem ich seit meiner Kindheit geträumt habe, das Leben, was ich mir erarbeitet habe. Früher war mein Leben eine Maske, aber mittlerweile ... habe ich zu mir selbst gefunden. Und es gibt nichts, für das ich mich schämen müsste."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "I have risen from the ashes of my past, shereen. I thought a lot about who I used to be and who I've become, and I realised that Jae Heydari is more than just a name. It is the life I've dreamt of since I was a child, the life I've managed to carve out of the cosmos for myself. It used to be a mask, but now... it is simply me. And I have nothing to be ashamed of."

languages.text: "Geçmişimin küllerinden yeniden doğdum şirinim. Eskiden kim olduğum ve kime dönüştüğüm üzerine bol bol düşündüm ve Jae Heydari'nin yalnızca bir isimden ibaret olmadığının farkına vardım. Bu, benim çocukluktan beri hayalini kurduğum yaşam. Kozmosu kazıyıp kendim için yonttuğum yaşam. Eskiden bir maskeydi ama şimdi... Bu, benim ve utanacak bir şeyim yok."
languages.original_text: "I have risen from the ashes of my past, shereen. I thought a lot about who I used to be and who I've become, and I realised that Jae Heydari is more than just a name. It is the life I've dreamt of since I was a child, the life I've managed to carve out of the cosmos for myself. It used to be a mask, but now... it is simply me. And I have nothing to be ashamed of."

traits.locale_text: "Geçmişimin küllerinden yeniden doğdum şirinim. Eskiden kim olduğum ve kime dönüştüğüm üzerine bol bol düşündüm ve Jae Heydari'nin yalnızca bir isimden ibaret olmadığının farkına vardım. Bu, benim çocukluktan beri hayalini kurduğum yaşam. Kozmosu kazıyıp kendim için yonttuğum yaşam. Eskiden bir maskeydi ama şimdi... Bu, benim. Ve utanacak da bir şeyim yok."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
